name: High-Dimensional Mathematical Function Optimization
description: Global optimization of a non-convex mathematical function in n-dimensional space. This function features a complex landscape with multiple local minima, testing algorithms' ability to navigate challenging search spaces.
constraint: All variables must satisfy x_i âˆˆ [-5.0, 10.0]. Function evaluations must maintain floating-point precision of 1e-8.

Second dimension variable in the mathematical function

target.name: Function Value
target.description: Minimize the value of the mathematical function defined over the given parameter space.
